info.title: Glass Break Sensor

sensor.glassbreak.description: This Resource describes a glass break sensor. The Property "value" is a boolean. A value of 'true' means that glass break has been sensed. A value of 'false' means that glass break not been sensed.

value.description: The glassbreak indication, true = glass break sensed, false = glass break not sensed.
